channel.title: million on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in million on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-07
item.description: Apple developing new ‘Apple Studio Display’ with 7K resolution (2 minute read) Apple is reportedly developing an Apple Studio Display with 7K resolution.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-14
item.description: Android 13 leaks: More Material You options, opt-in to app notifications (7 minute read) Android 13’s first developer previews won’t be out until at least March, but several sources have already begun leaking its new features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-20
item.description: TikTok Kitchens will bring viral culinary creations to fans (3 minute read) TikTok Kitchens is a new campaign by TikTok and Virtual Dining Concepts (VDC) that will bring TikTok foods to fans in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-09
item.description: Reddit to reportedly tokenize karma points and onboard 500M new users (2 minute read) Reddit is planning to convert its users’ karma points into Ethereum-based tokens.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-28
item.description: LinkedIn rolls out its freelance services marketplace globally after picking up 2M users in smaller US beta (4 minute read) LinkedIn is opening up its Service Marketplace, a service that lets freelancers advertise to those looking to hire people for short-term engagements.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-20
item.description: OnlyFans bans sexually explicit content to appease banks and payment services (3 minute read) OnlyFans will ban sexually explicit material on its platform from October 1 to comply with the requests of its banking partners and payout providers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-12
item.description: Tesla finally releases Full Self-Driving Beta v9: here’s what it looks like (3 minute read) Tesla has released its Full Self-Driving Beta v9 update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-02
item.description: Supposed Google Health app leak shows early interface (2 minute read) Screenshots from the upcoming Google Health app have been leaked online.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-14
item.description: Amazon details new warehouse robots, ‘Ernie’ and ‘Bert’ (2 minute read) Amazon is testing out two new robots, Ernie and Bert, to try to reduce strenuous movements for workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-25
item.description: Google now lets you password-protect the page that shows all your searches (2 minute read) Google users now have the option to add a password to their Web and Activity page.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-27
item.description: Apple to establish North Carolina campus, increase U.S. spending targets (2 minute read) Apple will establish a new campus in North Carolina, expand its operation in several other US states, and increase its spending targets with US suppliers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-16
item.description: Google Earth is now a 3D time machine (3 minute read) Google Earth just had its biggest update since 2017, with a new 3D time-lapse feature that lets users fly around the virtual globe and view satellite imagery from the past 37 years.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-20
item.description: Netflix Is Finally Adding a Streaming Roulette Feature As It Clinches 200 Million Subscriptions (2 minute read) Netflix has surpassed 200 million subscribers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-31
item.description: Amazon acquires podcast network Wondery (1 minute read) Podcast network Wondery will soon become part of Amazon Music.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-16
item.description: Facebook is having an end-of-year, company-wide meeting right now (Twitter Thread) This Twitter thread follows Facebook’s company-wide end-of-year meeting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-23
item.description: Charli D’Amelio hits 100 million TikTok followers (3 minute read) Charli D’Amelio has reached 100 million followers on TikTok.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-22
item.description: Facebook is testing mini social networks focused on you and your neighbors (2 minute read) Facebook is testing a new feature that encourages users to post and share news in social networks focused on small geographical areas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-13
item.description: The Pentagon Wants Elon Musk to Yeet Cargo Around the Planet In an Hour (2 minute read) The Pentagon has contracted SpaceX to develop rockets to deliver packages around the planet in under an hour.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-31
item.description: Huawei tops Samsung as world’s No. 1 smartphone company for first time (2 minute read) Huawei has surpassed Samsung as the world’s number one supplier of smartphones.
